newsitem.title: USA: FTP Software signs pact with IBM.
newsitem.headline: FTP Software signs pact with IBM.

text.p: FTP Software Inc and International Business Machines Corp said they signed an agreement to develop and market networking technologies designed around Internet protocols.
IBM and FTP said they will develop connectivity solutions for the Internet and for corporate intranets. They said they will make specific product announcements in the weeks ahead.

IBM also said it will incorporate FTP's software, called VIP network technology, with its networking software products, offering its customers enhanced security, reliability and manageability to networks using Internet protocols.
